onUpdate.name: onUpdate
onUpdate.description:
Callback function to handle different event types in controlled dropdown
**Event type here refers to `clicking on option` / `clicking on Clear, Cancel or Apply button`**
**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function
type.value: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

options.name: options
options.description:
OptionSchema: {
   label: string;
   value: React.ReactText;
   icon?: string;
   subInfo?: string | [MetaListProps]
    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);
   optionType?: OptionType;
   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}
OptionType: 'DEFAULT' | 'WITH\_ICON' | 'WITH\_META' | 'ICON\_WITH\_META' | Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | label | Describes Label of the option | | | value | Value of option | | | icon | Name of icon inside option | | | selected | Denotes default selection of option
(works in case of uncontrolled component) | | | disabled | Disables the option, making it unable to be pressed | | | group | Defines group to which the option belongs | |

loading.name: loading
loading.description:
Adds loaders inside `Dropdown` when waiting for an action to complete.
(Loading is internally handled when options are fetched from API.)

closeOnSelect.name: closeOnSelect
closeOnSelect.description: Determines if dropdown closes on option selection (works in case of single select)

triggerOptions.name: triggerOptions
triggerOptions.description:
TriggerProps:
{
    labelLimit?: number;
    customLabel?: (selected: number, totalOptions?: number, selectedOptions?: Option[]) => string;
    customTrigger?: (label: string) => React.ReactElement;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| labelLimit | Number of selected options 
to be shown on `Dropdown trigger` | 2 |
| customLabel | Callback function to change 
the label of trigger when options are selected | |
| customTrigger | Adds custom trigger | |

open.name: open
open.description: Determines if the `Dropdown Popover` is open

staticLimit.name: staticLimit
staticLimit.description:
Static limit of options to be rendered in the Dropdown List

**Max value supported: 100**

searchDebounceDuration.name: searchDebounceDuration
searchDebounceDuration.description: Debounce duration to call updateData in case of search term update

onPopperToggle.name: onPopperToggle
onPopperToggle.description:
Callback function called to toggle the `Dropdown Popover`

type: 'onClick' | 'outsideClick' | 'optionClick' | 'applyClick' | 'cancelClick'

**Works with `open` prop**

**Type `optionClick` works in case of single select (closeOnSelect = true)**

type.name: function
type.value: ((open: boolean, type?: string | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((open: boolean, type?: string | undefined) => void) | undefined

getLabel.name: getLabel
getLabel.description: Callback to get the updated label of `Dropdown trigger`

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description:
Callback function called when selected options are updated.
**In case of uncontrolled dropdown, it is called when user `clicks on option` /** **`clicks on Clear,or Apply button` while in case of controlled dropdown,** **it is called when selected options are updated**

type.name: function
type.value: ((selected: any, name?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((selected: any, name?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

onClose.name: onClose
onClose.description: Callback function called when dropdown is closed

type.name: function
type.value: ((selected: any[], name?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((selected: any[], name?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

noResultMessage.name: noResultMessage
noResultMessage.description: Display message when there is no result

applyButtonLabel.name: applyButtonLabel
applyButtonLabel.description:
Label of Apply button

(visible in case of `withCheckbox` and `showApplyButton`)

cancelButtonLabel.name: cancelButtonLabel
cancelButtonLabel.description:
Label of Cancel button

(visible in case of `withCheckbox` and `showApplyButton`)

withSearch.name: withSearch
withSearch.description: Determines if user can type to search for options (Always true for options count > staticLimit)

withCheckbox.name: withCheckbox
withCheckbox.description: Determines if user can select more than one items

withSelectAll.name: withSelectAll
withSelectAll.description:
Determines if `Select All` option is visible
**Applicable only in case of `withCheckbox` and `options <= staticLimit`**

showApplyButton.name: showApplyButton
showApplyButton.description: Updates the value of selected array after apply button is clicked, applicable in case of multiple selections

truncateOption.name: truncateOption
truncateOption.description: Trims label if it is too long

loadersCount.name: loadersCount
loadersCount.description: Number of loaders to be shown when loading is true

popoverOptions.name: popoverOptions
popoverOptions.description:
PopoverOptions:
{
    appendToBody?: boolean;
    hideOnReferenceEscape?: boolean;
    boundaryElement?: Element;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| appendToBody | Appends `Dropdown` inside body element | true |
| hideOnReferenceEscape | Hides the `Dropdown` when its reference element is outside the boundaries | true |
| boundaryElement | Boundary of Popover | |

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.description: String to show inside `Dropdown trigger` when no options are selected

menu.name: menu
menu.description: Determines if type of `dropdown` is a menu

optionRenderer.name: optionRenderer

type.name: function
type.value: ((props: OptionProps) => ReactElement<any, string | ((props: any) => ReactElement<any, any> | null) | (new (props: any) => Component<any, any, any>)>) | undefined

type.summary: ((props: OptionProps) => ReactElement<any, string | ((props: any) => ReactElement<any, any> | null) | (new (props: any) => Component<any, any, any>)>) | undefined

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
